mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payment_info (payment_id, user_id, package_id, user_count, payment_date) VALUES (#{paymentId}, #{userId}, #{packageId}, #{userCount}, NOW());
mapper.select: SELECT p.user_id AS userId, p.package_id AS packageId, p.user_count AS userCount, p.payment_date AS Date, p.payment_status AS Status, u.user_name AS userName, pk.package_title AS packageTitle, pk.package_cost AS price FROM payment_info p JOIN user u ON p.user_id = u.user_id JOIN package pk ON p.package_id = pk.package_id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY p.payment_date DESC;
